snippet.title: Introduction to JavaScript | JavaScript Course | Logic First Tamil
snippet.description:
Javascript Course explained  indepth in Tamil.

Github CodeLink - https://github.com/LogicFirstTamil
Notion link for code - https://balanced-quince-db1.notion.site/JavaScript-Course-Notes-by-Logic-First-66acc06b54ee4327baab785acc0319ce

VScode download link: https://code.visualstudio.com/download

00:00:00 - Prerequisite
00:00:25 - Applications of javascript
00:01:29 - What is a program?
00:01:55 - Running js code in browser
00:04:02 - Installing VS code and getting started
00:07:03 - Alert
00:08:10 - Comments - single and multi line
00:09:32 - Variables
00:12:45 - Exercise
00:13:08 - Where variables are stored?
00:13:50 - Binary
00:14:13 - Bytes for storage
00:14:37 - Dynamically typed language
00:15:33 - const
00:16:17 - var
00:16:46 - External js
